author: lihux25
body:
Validation shows the kink around 100 GeV is mostly gone. Tail difference beyond (1.5 TeV) needs further understanding but it's rare case in real physics:
http://hep.baylor.edu/cmshcal/Validation/MC/731p1_Fix_MCRUN2_73_V7-v1_vs_730_MCRUN2_73_V7-v1_RelVal/HighPtQCD/RecHits/RecHits_energy_HB.gif
title: Adjust Method 2 code to allow one pulse fit for high ampl > 500 fC
